content: this is a tutorial for alpine stitch you can make it with any yarn and corresponding hook you want this technique uses chain stitch single_crochet double_crochet and front post double_crochet on my website you will find **free written pattern** and **step-by-step photo-tutorial** on how to make it i also came up with six unique colorways which you can use for your projects edit december 2020 i added a **video tutorial**
